code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RegisterForm(){const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[role,setRole]=useState('user');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[success,setSuccess]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setSuccess('');try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/register',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password,role})});const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok)throw new Error(data.message||'Registration failed');setSuccess('Registration successful! Please login.');setTimeout(()=>navigate('/login'),1500);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"register-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Register"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'red'},children:error}),success&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'green'},children:success}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{margin:'0.5rem 0'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",name:"role",value:"user",checked:role==='user',onChange:()=>setRole('user')})," User"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{style:{marginLeft:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"radio",name:"role",value:"admin",checked:role==='admin',onChange:()=>setRole('admin')})," Admin"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Register"})]});}export default RegisterForm;
